about.title: About our studio
about.description: Learn more about our team, our order creation process and our philosophy.
about.html:
We are a team of professionals who love their work and try to create unique and high-quality products for each client. Our studio specializes in tailoring clothes to individual sizes, and we are proud that we can satisfy the most complex requests of our clients.

Our team

Our team consists of experienced designers, tailors and fashion designers who have many years of experience in the field of fashion and design. We constantly improve our skills and follow the latest trends in the fashion world in order to offer our clients only the best.

Our order creation process

Our order creation process begins with a consultation with the client, during which we discuss his wishes and preferences. Then our designers create a sketch of the future product, which is approved by the client. After this, our tailors begin sewing, using only high-quality materials and technologies. At every stage of order creation, we consult with the client to ensure that the product fully meets his expectations.

Our achievements

Over the years, we have achieved many achievements, including:

  • Creation of unique products for many famous people and brands
  • Participation in prestigious fashion shows and competitions
  • Receiving many positive reviews and thanks from our clients
  • Creating your own clothing brand, which is successfully sold in many countries around the world

guide.title: Sizing and Fit Guide
guide.html:
We understand that proper sizing is the key to comfortable, well-fitting clothing. That's why we've created this guide to help you accurately determine your measurements and make the ordering process simple and convenient.

What you will need:

  • Pen or marker
  • ГFlexible measuring tape (or rope and ruler)
  • Paper and pen for recording results

How to measure:

1. Neck circumference

Wrap the flexible metric tape around your neck, leaving one finger between your neck and the tape for comfort. Write down the result.

2. Chest circumference

Grasp the fullest part of your chest, placing the measuring tape under your arms and over your shoulder blades. Make sure the tape runs horizontally. Write down the result.

3. Waist circumference

Find the narrowest part of your waist and wrap it with a metric tape. Make sure the tape runs horizontally. Write down the result.

4. Hip circumference

Grasp the fullest part of your hips by passing the measuring tape across your buttocks. Make sure the tape runs horizontally. Write down the result.

5. Sleeve length

Measure the sleeve length from shoulder to wrist. Find the bone in your shoulder that sticks out when you lift your arm and measure from there to your wrist. Write down the result.

6. Length of dress or skirt

Measure from the waist to the desired length of the dress or skirt. Please note that length may vary depending on style and preference. Write down the result.

How to use the measurement results::

Compare your measurements to our size chart, which you can find on each product page. Choose the size that best matches your measurements. If your measurements are between sizes, we recommend choosing a larger size for comfort.

If you have questions or concerns regarding measurements or size selection, please contact us. We are always ready to help!

Tips for measuring:

  • It is best to measure yourself in underwear or clothes that fit your body.
  • Do not tighten the metric tape too much. It should lie flat, but not compress the body.
  • It is best to measure yourself with the help of another person to get the most accurate results.
  • If you are pregnant or breastfeeding, we recommend choosing a size that will match your measurements after giving birth or finishing breastfeeding.
  • If you are ordering clothing for a special event such as a wedding or prom, we recommend measuring yourself in advance so that you have enough time to adjust the size if necessary.
